description:
Protect your ski boots in transit. The spacious, cubic main compartment opens wide for easy access, and is lined with durable, coated polyester. Drain holes allow melting snow and slush to escape and keep moisture from getting locked in with your boots. A detachable liner lets you keep other items separate from your boots, and can be stashed when not needed. Oversized zipper pull loops accommodate gloved fingers in frigid ski area parking lots.

  • Outer fabric is burly 600d polyester, lined with polyurethane and treated with DWR for reliable water resistance
  • Padded interior is lined with 600d polyester laminated with waterproof TPE
  • Drain holes prevent water from being trapped inside
  • Detachable liner allows you to organize the interior, and folds out of the way when not in use
  • Inner security pocket with zip closure
  • Comfortable carry strap with padded handle
  • Beefy zipper
  • Oversized plastic pull loops for easy opening and closing with gloved hands
  • Reflective logo detail
name: MEC Fresh Tracks Boot Bag
